changeSet.comment: Add ldefault column to location table

changeSet.author: clarysabel

and.sqlCheck: select count(1) from location l where l.ldefault = 1 and l.ltype = (select u.fldno from udflds u where u.ftable='LOCATION' and u.ftype='LTYPE' and fcode='SSTORE')

changeSet.comment: Set DSS as default storage location
changeSet.sql: update location set ldefault = 1 where ltype = (select u.fldno from udflds u where u.ftable='LOCATION' and u.ftype='LTYPE' and fcode='SSTORE') and labbr='DSS'
